title: Change the SourceBranch to IbcSourceBranchName
body:
### Context
The wrong env variable name was taken from example.
It was unnoticeable on main branch, but revealed itself on service branches.

nodes.body:
> Wouldn't this come to main through an automated 17.9 => main merge?

With the merge we will receive extra commits that we don't need.

Automation will be trying to merge those commits until we make a proper merge commit in main. I think it would be better to let this change flow automatically. I can help adjust the 17.9 => main PR to only include what we want.
this change will be delivered as a part of https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/9911
